sentences.en: 300 tons of Peruvian mangoes were kept from entering France.
sentences.cn: 300吨秘鲁芒果被禁止进入法国。

sentences.en: Anne wouldn't mind going to Italy or France to live.
sentences.cn: 安妮很愿意去意大利或法国定居。

sentences.en: Australia's rugby union side enjoyed a record-breaking win over France.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的英式橄榄球联盟队创纪录地赢了法国队。

sentences.en: Britain and France have expressed some disagreement with the proposal.
sentences.cn: 英国和法国对这项提案已经发表了一些反对意见。

sentences.en: Canada and France should do the same.
sentences.cn: 加拿大和法国也应该这样做。

sentences.en: France edged out the British team by less than a second.
sentences.cn: 法国队以不到1秒的优势险胜英国队。

sentences.en: Germany borders on France.
sentences.cn: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.en: He asked in his Germanic English if I was enjoying France.
sentences.cn: 他操着一口带有德国腔的英语问我在法国玩得是否愉快。

sentences.en: He was admitted to the Academie Culinaire de France.
sentences.cn: 他获准加入法兰西厨艺学会。

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: I mind the time when we were in France together.
sentences.cn: 我记得我们一起在法国的时候。

sentences.en: In rural France, English language magazines are rather hard to come by.
sentences.cn: 在法国乡村，很难找到英语杂志。

sentences.en: Intellectual life in France was smothered by the occupation.
sentences.cn: 在被占领期间法国思想界受到了压制。

sentences.en: Luxembourg sketched out an acceptable compromise between Britain, France and Germany.
sentences.cn: 卢森堡草拟了一项英国、法国和德国之间都可以接受的妥协方案。

sentences.en: Mr Baker will return home via Britain and France.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生将取道英国和法国回国。

sentences.en: Now she has a job in France she can gratify her wish to see Europe.
sentences.cn: 现在她有了个在法国工作的机会，她就可满足她游览欧洲的愿望。

sentences.en: Red wine made in France is famous for its high quality.
sentences.cn: 法国出产的红葡萄酒以质优而闻名。

sentences.en: She spends her Easter holidays taking groups of children to France.
sentences.cn: 她带领一群孩子去法国过复活节。

sentences.en: They should evacuate all of France, and start all over.
sentences.cn: 他们应当疏散所有的法国人，然后重新开始。

sentences.en: This south-west region of France is the home of claret.
sentences.cn: 法国西南部的这个地区是干红葡萄酒的产地。

sentences.en: We leave Dover at ten and we should be across in France by midnight.
sentences.cn: 十点钟离开多佛的话， 我们午夜时分可以到达对面的法国。

sentences.en: With Germany, France has been the prime mover behind closer European integration.
sentences.cn: 法国与德国一道，一直是更加紧密的欧洲一体化进程的主要推动者。

trans.tran_cn: [地名]法国，法兰西，[姓氏]法郎士，[人名] 弗朗斯
